"Sous Vide Buddy" - A sous vide machine that doubles as a kitchen assistant. It can cook food to perfection and also help with meal prep tasks like chopping, peeling, and slicing.
"Food Scanner" - A handheld scanner that scans ingredients and generates recipes based on the available ingredients. It also provides nutritional information and cooking time.
"Smart Meal Planner" - An app that helps you plan your meals for the week. It suggests recipes based on your dietary preferences, available ingredients, and cooking skills.
"Egg Cooker" - A machine that cooks eggs in different styles (poached, scrambled, boiled, fried) and also has a built-in yolk separator.
"Food Printer" - A printer that can print edible food items. Itelsaely works with special edible inks and can print everything from simple designs to complex 3D food sculptures.
